TUTORIAL.INSTRUCTION_1: A new model is selected for each level
TUTORIAL.INSTRUCTION_2: Tap to change the symbols until they all match the model
TUTORIAL.INSTRUCTION_4: Complete the level if all symbols are the same
TUTORIAL.INSTRUCTION_5: You only have a few seconds to complete a level
TUTORIAL.CONTINUE: You can now start the game

GAME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION: I reached level {{level}} in Doomscroll with {{points}} points. Can you beat my score ?
